columns = [ 'Check-in Date', 'Check-in Time', 'Check-out Date', 'Check-out Time', 'Name', 'Company', 'Email Address', 'Contact No.', 'Room No.', 'No. of Days', 'No. of Pax', 'Amount', 'Remarks', 'Sector', 'Purpose of Visit', 'Travel Arrangement', 'Frequency of Visit', 'Gender', 'Type of Guest', 'Address/Country', 'Checked-in By', 'Checked-out By', 'Plate No.' ]; function Guests() { const [remarksFilter, setRemarksFilter] = useState('All'); const [guestData, setGuestData] = useState(guestDataInit); const [editIdx, setEditIdx] = useState(null); const [editRow, setEditRow] = useState(null); const filteredData = remarksFilter === 'All' ? guestData : guestData.filter(row => row.remarks === remarksFilter); const uniqueRemarks = Array.from(new Set(guestData.map(row => row.remarks))); const handleEdit = (idx) => { setEditIdx(idx); setEditRow({ ...filteredData[idx] }); }; const handleSave = () => { const globalIdx = guestData.findIndex((row, i) => row === filteredData[editIdx]); const updated = [...guestData]; updated[globalIdx] = editRow; setGuestData(updated); setEditIdx(null); setEditRow(null); }; return (
